content.name: Pilot Academy: Ranks and Relations
content.author: Chem O`Dun
content.description:
This mod introduces the Pilot Academy, allowing the Player to train pilots through simple trading while simultaneously improving relations with factions.
[h2][b]Features[/b][/h2] [list] [*] [b]Intuitive UI[/b]: Easily manage all Academy operations. [*] [b]Pilot Training[/b]: Train pilots effectively using trade operations. [*] [b]Faction Relations[/b]: Improve the Player's standing with other factions through trade. [*] [b]Wing Organization[/b]: Organize the Player's trainees into Wings for efficient management. [*] [b]Goal Selection[/b]: Prioritize either pilot training or improving relations. [*] [b]Faction Limiting[/b]: Restrict training and relation-building activities to specific factions for each Wing. [*] [b]Researchable Upgrades[/b]: [list] [*] Expand to 9 Wings. [*] Train pilots up to the 5-star rank. [*] Automatically hire [b]Cadets[/b] from selected factions. [*] Automatically assign [b]Trained Pilots[/b] to the Player's ships based on priority. [/list] [/list] [h2][b]Limitations[/b][/h2] [list] [*] The Academy currently only supports small (S-class) ships. [*] Trades used for the training process are non-profitable and uses only one item of selected ware per transaction. [/list] [h2][b]Requirements[/b][/h2] [list] [*] [b]X4: Foundations[/b]: Version 8.00HF3 or newer. [*] [b]UI Extensions and HUD[/b]: Version v8.0.4.0 or higher by [url=https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/kuertee?gameId=2659]kuertee[/url]. [list] [*] Available on Nexus Mods: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/552]UI Extensions and HUD[/url] [/list] [*] [b]Mod Support APIs[/b]: Version 1.95 or higher by [url=https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/sirnukes?gameId=2659]SirNukes[/url]. [list] [*] Available on Steam: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2042901274]SirNukes Mod Support APIs[/url] [*] Available on Nexus Mods: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/503]Mod Support APIs[/url] [/list] [/list] [h2][b]Caution[/b][/h2]
This is a complex mod and may have undiscovered issues. Please report any problems on the Nexus Mods or Steam Workshop pages.
[h2][b]Usage[/b][/h2]
[h2][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3663065144]Detailed Guide.[/url][/h2]
